title: What Do We Want to Do?
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Everyone, look at this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh! Both μ's and Aqours are preparing for their events!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>We can’t afford to lose to them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Even so, we haven’t decided what we’re doing yet, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>As usual...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>We all want to do different things~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hehe. But that’s just how we are.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes, indeed. But there is one thing we all have in common, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Something we have in common...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I got it! We all want to have a great time with everyone who supports us!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>That’s correct!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Then we’re all on the same page~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>In that case, wouldn’t it be great to have a super cute photo session, which Kasumin already planned for?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>A sports meet with Lanzhu would be fun too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I think a beautiful pose contest taught by me, a senior member, would also be good.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I think it would be great to have a movie screening according to my recommendations!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I wonder how many times we’ve had this conversation...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ahaha......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hmm, let’s just do all of them. Instead of discussing what to narrow it down to, we could all just be preparing for the things we wanna do, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That might be a good idea...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Everyone~ Any objections?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Nope!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
